channel.title: Tzhaar Saber[Updated]
channel.description: Started as one of world of war craft weapons and came up with this. Maybe there is a weapon that is similour to this one, but didn't intend to copy it, i just free handed it and color it like this because it looked something that Tzhaar NPC could use ;D [IMG]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/959/tzhaarsaber.jpg[/img]

item.title: Tzhaar Saber[Updated]
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

spy man47:

Nice! so there is two? or just only one?

One, in the picture there is model + frames and model only faces.

You should recreate this in all primitives, it shouldn't be too hard at all. The model looks traced and has some bad polygon structure, but the concept is very nice. I say to keep this model and maybe release it for RSPS, but have the primitive one (which might have higher polygon count) for showing off :D
Well fixing some bad looking polys is coming on the update to this, cause, i was so hurry to finish this(~20min work) so i knew there will be some bad ones. I'm planing to add a bit more details, maybe glowing or something, so just wait for an update ;D
Would you mind me re-creating this in a different form? I have an idea for this :)
huh?? ;D

Read full topic
